name: Rifted
description:
Rifted is a puzzle platformer game, where the pixel worlds of fire and ice have found the rift between their worlds causes them to have to enter and close the portals that have opened between their dimensions.  Play as fire and ice elementals, traversing a dangerous world simultaneously.  Be sure to watch both elementals, because if one should fail, so shall the other!

Level Designer:

Aiden Elsener

Software Engineers:

Addison Shuppy

Devyn Lehrman

Artists:

Zijian Niu

Carl Fredrick

Austin Fermazin
